Its that time of year PERIOD

Bedlam is a term that resonates throughout the state and while its the states rivalry the Oklahoma Sooners have dominated the Cowboys in the past with OU holding an  series advantage PERIOD

The tides have begun to turn in the Cowboys favor PERIOD OSU coach Mike Gundy has turned out AllAmericans and doubledigit win seasons but wins the instate rivals have not materialized PERIOD Gundy has a  record as a head coach against OU and never won as a player PERIOD

Coaches are often defined by their success in rivalry games some lose jobs due to lack of success PERIOD Thats not to say Gundys job is in jeopardy but winning Bedlam goes a long way for recruiting national exposure BCS implications etc PERIOD

Here are three things to look for as the Cowboys aim for a second Big  championship in three years and another birth in the Fiesta Bowl PERIOD

Early Start

No this is not referencing the kickoff time PERIOD For once OSU is a significant favorite against OU PERIOD The beginning of the game would either dictate that the hype OSU has been getting is real and deserved or OU will thrive in its role of spoiler PERIOD We could see OSU panic if things dont go as planned early on Saturday PERIOD On the other hand going up by two scores in the first few possessions could spell easy sailing to the Fiesta Bowl PERIOD

Pride and Pretentious

The Cowboys have everything to play for but the Sooners have things at stake too PERIOD You think it sits well with the OU seniors that they are being called spoilers to OSU Thats not what they had in mind when they signed their letter of intent PERIOD The Sooners are insulted by the circumstances of this game PERIOD That being said this is a perfect opportunity for the Cowboys to send a message statewide stating which program is on the rise PERIOD

Hold the Fort

Boone Pickens Stadium was rocking for Baylor and while this game doesnt have the same flair its still Bedlam PERIOD The OSU defense once praised only on a local level now has some prestige to it PERIOD The country took notice of its dominant performance against the seemingly unstoppable Baylor offense PERIOD What Glenn Spencers unit does for an encore could be the difference between the Fiesta Bowl and the Buffalo Wild Wings Bowl PERIOD
